Client.Name: Shanghai TuChong Network Technology Co., Ltd.

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: TuChong was founded in 2009 and has three product businesses: TuChong Community, TuChong Creative, and TuChong Premium. As an image dissemination platform, TuChong Community currently has 20 million registered users, and photographers from all over the world publish their photography and video works on TuChong every day. As a copyright material trading platform (TuChong Creative and TuChong Premium), TuChong represents visual copyright resources from more than 300 resource parties around the world to meet the visual marketing needs of various scenarios. In June 2020, TuChong became the official partner of Adobe Stock in China, making visual copyright resources more international and diversified.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File:
Image data: mainly in JPEG and PNG formats, more than 2 billion images, with a total volume of about 1.5P.
Video data: MP4, MOV and other formats, about 1P.
Other data: document data, user structured storage data, semi-structured logs, business data, etc., totaling about 0.5P
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: First, import the data into the local node to generate a CID, then initiate a storage transaction, split, encode, copy and package the data into sectors. Miners perform pre-submission, sealing and other operations, store the data and submit storage proofs regularly. When retrieval is required, users obtain the decoded and recovered data from miners through CID.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, Europe, North America, Africa, South America
